1. Overview
This document describes a web application with frontend and backend components.

2. Frontend
Build a React dashboard with charts and data tables.
Use Tailwind CSS for responsive layout.

2.1 Navigation
Add sidebar navigation with route-based highlighting.

3. Backend
REST API: GET /api/v1/metrics to return dashboard data.
PostgreSQL database for metrics storage.

4. Deployment
Deploy using Docker containers on Kubernetes.
Set up CI/CD pipeline with GitHub Actions.
